pages.title: Netherite Upgrade
pages.text: The Netherite Upgrade Smithing Template can be found inside Bastion Remnents within the Nether.$(br2)It has a 100% spawn rate inside a Bastions 'Treasure' Chest whilst the other 3 Bastion Chests have a 10% Chance.$(br2)The Netherite Upgrade Smithing Template is required to Upgrade Diamond equipment to Netherite
